sentences.english: " He believes that population decline constitute a threat to national development, the initiative "every family raising three or even more children.

sentences.english: In other words, parent yourself vicariously through parenting your own children.

sentences.english: States Parties shall render appropriate assistance to persons with disabilities in the performance of their child-rearing responsibilities.

And then we can discuss how to better bring them up.

sentences.english: I imagine it's pretty easy to raise your kid if you're bigoted.
